original_text: After this Jesus revealed himself again to the disciples by the Sea of Tiberias, and he revealed himself in this way.
korean_text: 그 후에 예수께서 디베랴 호수에서 또 제자들에게 자기를 나타내셨으니 나타내신 일은 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus revealed himself again to the disciples
and he revealed himself in this way
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 이런 방식으로 자신을 나타내셨다
